text: everyone today I'm making a short camp
or orange chicken is a stomach looking
dish with amazing fragrance and taste
it's a quite popular chicken dish in
Asian restaurants in the West let's
begin recipes you will need find red
gram or 1 pound of boneless chicken I'm
using chicken thigh today but of course
you can also use chicken breast cut into
bite-sized pieces then insert into a
large ziploc or plastic bag now season
the chicken with salt pepper some sugar
and chicken stock about 1/3 TSP each
also grate in some ginger about half a
teaspoon toss well so the seasonings can
absorb into all the chicken pieces then
add 3 tablespoons of cornstarch give it
a really good shake so the starch will
form a coating outside each chicken
piece heat a generous amount of
vegetable oil in a frying pan gently
drop in the chicken pieces and fry until
is golden brown give frying on medium
heat when one side is golden prior you
can flip it over just fry the other side
as well when the chicken is cooked
through and turn golden brown on all
sides you can take them out and let them
rest on a rack or paper towel to absorb
the excess oil break one orange to get
about 1 tablespoon amounts of carbon
chess then cut the orange in half and
cut one thin slice at the middle that
will be used for garnish later then
squeeze the orange to get about half a
cup of orange juice to make the sauce
combine together and we'll cover orange
juice quarter cup of vinegar you can use
white vinegar or apple cider vinegar 2
tablespoons of sugar to balance out the
sourness a tablespoon of oyster sauce to
give the sauce a shiny look 2
tablespoons of soy sauce and the oven
chest also add a tablespoon of fighting
just ribs and a teaspoon of cornstarch
to thicken the sauce star really well to
have the sugar and past
dissolve completely next heat a
tablespoon of oil in the pan and fries a
tablespoon of minced garlic and cheese
pie pans then pouring the sauce and
simmer on medium low heat until it
bubbles up and thicken then causing the
fried chicken and stir really well so
the sauce will coats the shiny look
outside each chicken piece while look at
that so shiny and delicious
now transfer to a serving plate and
garnish with some chopped spring onion
or cilantro and don't forget some
roasted sesame seeds as well add the
orange slice for garnish to let
everybody know that is orange chicken
dish and we're going to serve this with
hot steamed rice mmm let me give it a
try this smells so good the chicken is
too crispy and that sweet and sour sauce
smells so good of orange and the kick of
ginger so so so yummy you definitely
should give this recipe a try
and if you do please share photo on
instagram with hashtag and recipes so I
can also enjoy your gas short camp and
lick the screen thank you for watching
bye bye
